Translations.Text: aur sino ki poshida baatein zaaher kardi jayengi
beshak un ka rab us din un ke haal se pura ba-qabar hoga
khad khadaa dene waali
kya hai wo khad khadaa dene waali
tujhe kya maloom ke wo khad khadaa dene waali kya hai
jis din insaan bikhre hoye parvaano ki tarah ho jayenge
aur pahaad dhune hoye rangeen oon ki tarah ho jayenge
phir jis ke padle bhaari honge
wo to dil pasandh araam ki zindagi mein hoga
aur jis ke padle halke honge
us ka thikaana haawiya hai
tujhe kya maloom ke wo kya hai
wo tundh wa tez aag (hai)
zyaadati ki chaahat ne tumhe ghaafil kar diya
yahaa tak ke tum qabrastaan ja pahonche
har giz nahi, tum an qareeb maloom karloge
har giz nahi, phir tumhe jald ilm ho jayega
har giz nahi, agar tum yaqini taur par jaan lo
to beshak tum jahannam dekh loge
aur tum ose yaqeen ki aankh se dekh loge
phir us din tum se zaroor biz-zaroor nemato ka sawaal hoga
